Articles.Content:
Mods: mechjeb 2, mechjeb embedded, texture replacer, atmospheric trajectories

Windows 7

I was making a new soyuz replica and well I had the glitch with symmetry where it is placed twice and when I took off the boosters it could not be placed anywhere and there were still some parts of the extra doubled booster floating (like not red) and I could not get rid of it, I cannot replace the booster I took off, or any part for that matter.

It is 500 parts so it should not do this, usually it does not lag until 800 parts (Hard to tell I keep the max fps at 20).

The ship has no mod parts and I deleted the mechjeb parts.

Edited November 18, 2014 by LABHOUSE
I deleted my mods and it still happened.

It's a bug with symmetry, it can be fixed but it's not guaranteed, you need to remove the part where the symmetry bug started, if you can find it.

It's often a case of trial and error, or scrapping the craft and starting again.

Try turn on part clipping. That usually helps. Also if you try put the part somewhere where it is green and then immediately put it back it should work, but like sal said, trial and error....lots of error...

Part clipping won't work and I cannot find the root part because The parts I try to remove (first stage) leaves the duplicate booster floating and when I try to remove it it takes away the others. I will just salvage what I can with the subassemblies.
